pages.text: $(bred)Dolphin Rider$() is the best partner who won the gold medal in the dolphin acrobatics competition.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)60$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Super Fast In Water$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will jump to $(bred)rapidly reach$() its target when distance is suitable and $(l)avoid damage when jumping$(), and they will separate to $(l)Zombie Dolphin$() and $(l)Dolphin Rider Zombie$() when land on ground or jump finish.
